00017 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00018 /// CTreeHistoryArtist::CTreeHistoryArtist
00019 ///
00020 /// @description    This is the default constructor for the CTreeNodeArtist
00021 ///                 class.
00022 /// @pre            None
00023 /// @post           Member variables are initialized.
00024 ///
00025 /// @param canvas:  This is the area to which all the nodes will be painted.
00026 ///
00027 /// @limitations    None
00028 ///
00029 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00030 CTreeHistoryArtist::CTreeHistoryArtist( QPaintDevice *canvas )
00031 {
00032     m_canvas = canvas;
00033     m_model = NULL;
00034     m_style = CStyleToolkit::instance();
00035 }

00052 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00053 /// CTreeHistoryArtist::moveName
00054 ///
00055 /// @description     This function returns the name of the move to reach node.
00056 /// @pre             None
00057 /// @post            The name of the move is returned.
00058 ///
00059 /// @param node:     The STreeNode to be reached by the move.
00060 ///
00061 /// @return QString: A QString representing the move to reach node is returned.
00062 ///
00063 /// @limitations     None
00064 ///
00065 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00066 QString CTreeHistoryArtist::moveName( const STreeNode* node )
00067 {
00068     if( node == NULL )
00069         return QString();
00070     if( node->s_parent == NULL )
00071         return QString();
00072     
00073     QString n = node->s_name;
00074     QString p = node->s_parent->s_name;
00075     
00076     if( n.count() > 1 || p.count() > 1 )
00077         return QString( "%1-%2" ).arg(p).arg(n);
00078     return QString( "%1%2" ).arg(p).arg(n);
00079 }
00080 
00081 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00082 /// CTreeHistoryArtist::paintTable
00083 ///
00084 /// @description     This function paints all the nodes to the screen.
00085 /// @pre             None
00086 /// @post            All the nodes are drawn to the screen.
00087 ///
00088 /// @param painter:  This is a pointer to the painter to use.  If no value is
00089 ///                  passed, create a painter to use.
00090 ///
00091 /// @limitations     None
00092 ///
00093 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00094 void CTreeHistoryArtist::paintTable( QPainter *painter )
00095 {
00096     //Make sure the pointer to the model has been initialized.
00097     if (m_model == NULL)
00098         return;
00099         
00100     //Make sure the root node of the tree isn't NULL, then call the
00101     //paintModelHelper function to pain the model.
00102     if ( m_model->getRootNode() == NULL )
00103         return;
00104 
00105     //This variable is used for painting to the canvas if no painter was
00106     //specified.
00107     QPainter localPainter( m_canvas );
00108 
00109     //Check if the calling function did not pass a painter and use
00110     //the local one in that case.
00111     if ( painter == NULL )
00112         painter = &localPainter;
00113 
00114     //Create the QPainter object to paint the model.
00115     painter->setPen( m_style->getPen() );
00116     painter->setBrush( m_style->getBrush() );
00117     painter->setFont( m_style->getFont() );
00118     painter->setRenderHint( QPainter::Antialiasing );
00119 
00120     HistoryTable historyTable = m_model->getHistoryTable();
00121     HistoryTable::const_iterator i = historyTable.constBegin();
00122     QRect cellRect( painter->boundingRect( 0,0,0,0,0,"WW-WW" ) );
00123     cellRect.adjust( -4,-4,4,4 );
00124     cellRect.moveTopLeft( m_model->getHistoryPosition() );
00125 
00126     while ( i != historyTable.constEnd() )
00127     {
00128         painter->drawRect( cellRect );
00129         painter->drawText( cellRect, Qt::AlignCenter,
00130                            moveName(i->first) );
00131         
00132         cellRect.moveTopLeft( cellRect.bottomLeft() );
00133         
00134         painter->drawRect( cellRect );
00135         painter->drawText( cellRect, Qt::AlignCenter, 
00136                            QString::number(i->second) );
00137         
00138         cellRect.moveBottomLeft( cellRect.topRight() );
00139         
00140         ++i;
00141     }
00142 }
00143

00155 ///
00156 /// @limitations   None
00157 ///
00158 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00159 void CTreeHistoryArtist::setModel( CTreeGraphModel *model )
00160 {
00161     m_model = model;
00162 }
